cast.name: 佩内洛普·米契尔 Penelope Mitchell

introduction: 《急速出击》是一部讲述紧急事件反应部队的电视剧。该部队训练有素，在反恐行动中使用先进的武器装备及爆破物，并在劫持人质事件发挥特殊作用（谈判）。他们每天24小时出没于城市之间，尽可能以迅速及非致命方式解决问题。他们的目的就是：化解危机、拯救生命、预防犯罪。Rush Is An Action Drama Series Set In A New Critical Incident Response Police Unit. They're Trained In Counter-terrorism, Advanced Weaponry, Explosives, Bush Survival, Hand-to Hand Combat, Navigation, Advanced Driving And Rope Work As Well As The Psychology Of Negotiation In Hostage Situations. They Are About A 'less Lethal' Response To Any Incident Likely To Escalate Out Of Hand. Fast, Courageous And Irreverent, They're A Bunch Of Supremely Trained Young Cops, Working As A 24 Hour Mobile Team Responding To Crisis Anywhere In The City Within Ten Minutes. They Bring Negotiation Skills, Lateral Thinking, Less Lethal Weaponry And A Fresh Attitude. Their Brief Is To Strive For A Fast And Non-lethal Resolution To The Problem At Hand. An Insider's View Of Police Under Pressure - Defusing Crises, Saving Lives, Preventing Crime Rather Than Catching The Bad Guys After The Deed Is Done.
